comments.text:
Created attachment 527185
Make some labels wrap

There are occasionally bug reports about labels getting cut off in the account settings dialog due to strings being longer than we expect. One easy way to fix this for the horizontal case would be to allow those labels to wrap. Here's a patch that does this.

As a followup, we could also make the dialog scrollable (which would fix the vertical case as well as really really small widths), and/or resize the window based on the content when it's loaded.
comments.author: jporterbugs@gmail.com
comments.creator: jporterbugs@gmail.com
